personal_info.bio: My name is Rohit Kumar and I am a Software Engineer II for Ascorb Technology Pvt Ltd. I am an accomplished coder and programmer, and I enjoy using my skills to contribute to the exciting technological advances that happen every day at my company. I post graduated from the Banaras Hindu University in 2019 with a Masters's Degree in Master of Computer Applications. While in college, I was a member of Coordinating Team in “National Conference on Digital Transformations in Higher Education Institution, BHU (2018)”

skill_info.skills: C, PHP, Java, Nodejs, JavaScript, Unit Testing, Debugging, OOPS, Shell Script, Data structure, Algorithms HTML, Bootstrap, CSS and Sass
VS Code, Chrome and Vue development Tools

job_experiances.description: Experience in SDLC(Software development Life Cycle), from code implementation, testing and agile practices. The company has two major products:

sub_desc.heading: EDMINGLE
bullet_points: Delivered new pages using EmberJs framework.
Responsible for creating Rest API for different backend functionalities using PHP.
Fixed bugs and problems across the entire codebase in an efficient, timely manner.
Upgraded system with the international selling features.
Collaboration with Product team and Business team for integration and workflow details.

sub_desc.heading: TOPLEARNR
bullet_points: Upgraded Existing System into SPA using Vuejs framework.
Upgraded existing backend using advanced technologies like PHP 7+.
Designed and implemented unit tests to verify the functionality of user interfaces, backend processing, connectivity, relational database interactions.
Responsible for creating microservers for the PDF Print server, Api proxy server, Mysql proxy server using NodeJs.
Responsible for creating Question ingestester using PHP.
Fixed bugs and problems across the entire codebase in an efficient, timely manner.

job_experiances.description: The project where the mission is to simplify the end-to-end recruitment process. The only goal is to reduce the amount of effort, time, and cost of the hiring process.

bullet_points: Experience in redyhire on SDLC, from code implementation, testing and agile practices.
Delivered components of Question creation and invite pages with reusable components using ReactJs.
3 Months of work experience in modern framework ReactJs.
